Dear LINGO GENIE L2 Backers!
We're thrilled to share that we've surpassed our funding goal by 533%! ğŸŒŸ A massive THANK YOU to all of you! Your support has been incredible and pivotal to this achievement. Without your belief in our vision, this wouldn't be possible! ğŸ”¥
ğŸŒŸ BIG BONUSğŸŒŸ
Your support has been incredible, and we're beyond grateful! Our team has been actively discussing our backer's valuable feedback regarding subscription fees, to thank you all and celebrate reaching new heights, we're thrilled to announce this ğŸ big bonus ğŸ:
We will offer lifetime free access to major international languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Chinese, etc.) for our early supporters, this includes basic services, value-added services (audio and video calls, simultaneous interpretation), and other functions.
ğŸ‰ Latest Update:
We're excited to share a review from Sami Luo! Sami tests LINGO GENIE L2 AI translator and highlights its impressive features. Watch to see why it's perfect for travelers and professionals! ğŸ‘‡
As we continue this journey, we promise to keep you updated on every step of bringing LINGO GENIE L2 to life. Stay tuned for more exciting updates! ğŸ™

Let's keep this momentum going! Share the news, spread the word, and together, let's make LINGO GENIE L2 a must-have for global
